Reviews.Title: Value for Money ?
Reviews.Author: BittenAgain
Reviews.Content: I paid over $14 for a $10 refill card!  That cannot be said to be a good deal, can it?

Reviews.Title: seriously?  is anyone that dumb...?
Reviews.Author: Cheripashka "Cheripashki and other such treas...
Reviews.Content: unless someone is overseas... or absolutely cannot purchase anything unless it is on the amazon website (maybe they have a gift card and no other funds)  why on earth would anyone pay nearly $15 for something that is CLEARLY only worth $10.... I mean...duh...  why do sellers like this have to exploit people thusly...?  not cool...
